alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cass; Dodge; Douglas; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 7:10PM CDT until April 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON...NORTHERN LANCASTER...SOUTHEASTERN DODGE...EASTERN SEWARD...WESTERN DOUGLAS...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER... SAUNDERS AND WEST CENTRAL CASS COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Mead to 6 miles northeast of Pleasant Dale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wahoo, Mead, Yutan, Valley, Lincoln, Waterloo, Waverly and Greenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Cass; Dodge; Douglas; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward; Washington
